Method Detail

createV2Api

public static Api2 createV2Api(String url,
                               String provider_private_key)
Creates a new Version 2 Api object.

Parameters:
url - URL of the server to connect to. e.g. http://su1.3scale.net.
provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
Returns:
A new Api object.

createV2Api

public static Api2 createV2Api(String provider_private_key)
Creates a new Version 2 Api object using DEFAULT_3SCALE_PROVIDER_API_URL

Parameters:
provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
Returns:
A new Api object.

createV2Api

public static Api2 createV2Api(String url,
                               String provider_private_key,
                               HttpSender sender)
Creates a new Api object.

Parameters:
url - URL of the server to connect to. e.g. http://server.3scale.net.
provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
sender - The HttpSender object to be used for communication with the server.
Returns:
A new Api object.
